title: Semi-automated pipeline to accelerate multi-site flowsheet alignment and concept mapping in electronic health records

abstract: Objectives Health-care institutions customize electronic health record (EHR) configurations to reflect their unique workflows and patient care priorities. Ensuring EHR alignment across sites facilitates seamless information exchange. We …
